resources.string:
Hello, This is GallOrg, Gallery Organizer from scinix! 

With this, you can organize your Android gallery into Albums with meaningful name. Usage is simple. just use "Share" option from gallery. 

Contact to Author: 
	 scinix@gmail.com 
	 http://sio4.tistory.com 
	 @scinix twitter.com

ChangeLogs: 
 * version 1.0.2 
	 - auto-completion bug fix by disabling. 
	 - add special destination "back to the Camera". 
	 - add feature "empty album clean-up". 
	 - restrict to "image/*" and "video/*" for now. 
	 - now working with File Manager too. 
 * version 1.0.1 
	 - fix for losing file while move across filesystem.
...end in the end, \nthe love you take is equal to the love you make.
